tool_description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site
name: Yummly
title: Yummly

api_list.name: feeds/list

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: The value of browse-categories/display/tag returned in categories/list API

api_list.name: reviews/list
api_list.description: List reviews, feedback from other users

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

required_parameters.name: globalId
required_parameters.description: The value of globalId field returned in feeds/list and feeds/search API

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

api_list.name: categories/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yummly2.p.rapidapi.com/categories/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yummly2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yummly2.p.rapidapi.com/categories/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yummly2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: feeds/list-similarities
api_list.description: List similar recipes by name and author

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in feeds/list and feeds/search API

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

optional_parameters.name: apiFeedType
optional_parameters.description: The value of apiFeedType field returned in feeds/list and feeds/search API

optional_parameters.name: authorId
optional_parameters.description: The value of authorId field returned in feeds/list and feeds/search API

api_list.name: feeds/search
api_list.description: Search for recipes by name and option filters

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

required_parameters.name: maxResult
required_parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

optional_parameters.name: CHOLEMax
optional_parameters.description: Range from 0 to 1

optional_parameters.name: allowedAttribute
optional_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in tags/list (separated by comma for multiple value)

optional_parameters.name: sweetMax
optional_parameters.description: How much sweet the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Food name or ingredient

optional_parameters.name: ENERC_KCALMax
optional_parameters.description: Range from 0 to 1000

optional_parameters.name: FAT_KCALMax
optional_parameters.description: Range from 0 to 1000

optional_parameters.name: maxTotalTimeInSeconds
optional_parameters.description: the time (in seconds) it takes to complete the dish

optional_parameters.name: piquantMax
optional_parameters.description: How much piquant the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

optional_parameters.name: meatyMax
optional_parameters.description: How much meaty the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

optional_parameters.name: FASATMax
optional_parameters.description: Range from 0 to 50

optional_parameters.name: sweetMin
optional_parameters.description: How much sweet the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

optional_parameters.name: piquantMin
optional_parameters.description: How much piquant the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

optional_parameters.name: sourMin
optional_parameters.description: How much sour the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

optional_parameters.name: meatyMin
optional_parameters.description: How much meaty the meal is, such as 0.2 (0 to 1)

optional_parameters.name: sourMax
optional_parameters.description: How much sour the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

optional_parameters.name: CHOCDFMax
optional_parameters.description: Range from 0 to 100

optional_parameters.name: saltyMin
optional_parameters.description: How much salty the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

optional_parameters.name: saltyMax
optional_parameters.description: How much salty the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

api_list.name: feeds/auto-complete
api_list.description: Get auto complete suggestions by name or ingredients, etc...

api_list.name: tags/list
api_list.description: List all tags in which recipes are group together
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yummly2.p.rapidapi.com/tags/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yummly2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
